ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1257
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Greg, As far as I know they are made either by the individual or one of the moderators of the specific forum. They use pretty much any program (depending
ygData.messageBody:
Well Greg,

As far as I know they are made either by the individual or one of the moderators of the specific forum. They use pretty much any program (depending on the level of design) from MS paint to Photoshop. It all depends on what you want in your sig.

I've been playing with designing my own for a while and not even near completion sue to time. You can try making one yourself or simply post on one of the forums that you want one and someone may respond offering to make you one.

One of the coolest ones I've seen was done on one of the Ranger forums, called himself the "Rivervale Slasher" and it had a shot of him and several halflings with this look of horror on their faces. It was just to dang cool.

Durgaa

On 12 Jan 2006 18:49:38 -0000, EverQuest@yahoogroups.com < EverQuest@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

Message: 1
   Date: Wed, 11 Jan 2006 20:49:29 -0000
   From: "Greg" <freechylde@... >
Subject: Something new

I have a quick question that is out og game but naturally related to
the game. I am sure many of you use, have seen, or know how or where to
answer my question.

I have seen many an avatar/singnature "picture" used by many up and
down the forums, and I decided I want one, or two. Can someone tell me
how they are made ( programs used -low budget best-downloaded or
borrowed), link me tyo website that has them and/or shows this info,
and lastly how to use the thing once made.

Thankyou

As always

Greg
